Question: His body lies beneath the ____ Institute in a spectacular vault covered in depictions of his accomplishments in Byzantine mosaics.
Hints: This person was born on December 27, 1822, in Dole in the Jura region of France, into the family of a poor tanner.
This person won the Leeuwenhoek medal, microbiology's highest Dutch honor in Arts and Sciences, in 1895.
In ****'s early work as a chemist, he resolved a problem concerning the nature of tartaric acid (1848).
